Package ooga.model.initialization

Class BasicPieceTest

java.lang.Object
ooga.model.initialization.BasicPieceTest
public class BasicPieceTest
extends java.lang.Object
Testing class for piece creation, reflection for various piece components, and basic testing of getAllPossibleMoves
